Starbucks Experience
The Global Design and Innovation Team of Starbucks sets the future direction of the company. The team develops the entire journey of coffee from beans into a cup in the hands of the customers, starting their innovation at The Starbucks Reserve Roastery and Tasting Room in Seattle.
